title: Video: TRP and Classified’s New 16-Speed Vistar Groupset at Eurobike
content:
Sixteen gears and an internally geared hub make for one of the most interesting 'collabs' in the bike industry.

Read the full article at Video: TRP and Classified’s New 16-Speed Vistar Groupset at Eurobike on Velo.
author: Dave Everett
